title: vLLM - Load & Saturation
_comment: Dashboard focused on system load, saturation, queue buildup, GPU pressure and latency under load.

panels.title: Token Prefill Time (p95): Is it long because my prompts are big?
panels._comment: Latency of the prefill phase (first compute pass).
panels._interpretation: If spikes: prompt lengths too large or GPU memory pressure.

panels.title: Token Decode Time (p95): Does the GPU lag during the generation ?
panels._interpretation: If rises at same time as queue â†‘: GPU fully saturated.
